overview: Mixed martial arts series in which male performers compete in the cage, no stuntmen here for a carnal prize. All full-contact bouts are two three minute rounds with a round each for grappling and kickboxing. Winner get's The Prize, loser takes The Punishment. Two more action packed bouts & hardcore XXX action in this Big Budget Reality Based Series. Battle Bang is assured to bring a whole new fan base to the MMA community.
title: Battle Bang 5
